name: ss_prints_plus_bootstrap
description: This is a website for a small t-shirt and vinyl printing company

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.imagemin: imagemin images/* -o dist/images && imagemin images/designs -o dist/images/designs
scripts.usemin: usemin products.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/products.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html

author: Rodrick Coleman
